name: Leisure Suit Larry - Magna Cum Laude Uncut and Uncensored
description: With gorgeous co-eds everywhere, college dweeb Larry Lovage is chasing around more than his diploma. He's trying to live up to the legend of his uncle, Larry Laffer, everyone's favourite polyester playboy. Larry Lovage is a typical college student.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 3 GB available space
